com.deagenstroup.agendaassistant.logic.taskplanning

Class ActivityPlanner

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.deagenstroup.agendaassistant.logic.taskplanning.ActivityPlanner

  • public class ActivityPlanner
extends java.lang.Object
    Class responsible for keeping track of activities that have not yet been scheduled into the user's calender.
